column2: "T-that's great! You can defeat Garongo really easily even with its thick armor!"
"That felt so epic! This is how an active duty ARKS fights!"
"<%me>...! Could I call you Professor from now on?!"
"I'd like to learn as much as I can from you from now own until I become a full-fledged ARKS!"
"Thank you so very much for all of your teachings! I look forward to learning more from you!"
